paragraph.list:
You may anchor a class to the diagram by right clicking the figure and dropping it onto the anchor button
../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_remove_anchor_color.png
. Likewise you may remove an anchor by doing the same to a currenlty anchored class. Anchoring will force the class to remain anchored to the diagram, and it will not move around when in physics mode.
paragraph.tip: Tip: To see the effects of anchoring turn on physics mode81_physics_mode.xml and then anchor a class as described above. Now open the physics settings dialog84_physics_dialog.xml and adjust the sliders. In the diagram you will see all anchored classes do not move whilst those surrounding them adjust to the new settings.
